content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'cdb-synapse-link2'))
    THROW 50000, 'As a prerequisite, create a credential with Azure Cosmos DB key in SECRET option:
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [cdb-synapse-link2]
    WITH IDENTITY = ''SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE'', SECRET = ''EwM1DoepOL8XAkPhLT31zEDE55sNufb5EkPItuorDok5DKyPbKAK1S3mwO2TjVuPKjPfhZDAcZ4XACDbtNqu7Q==''', 0
GO

 CREATE CREDENTIAL [cdb-synapse-link2] WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'EwM1DoepOL8XAkPhLT31zEDE55sNufb5EkPItuorDok5DKyPbKAK1S3mwO2TjVuPKjPfhZDAcZ4XACDbtNqu7Q=='


SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cdb-synapse-link2;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'Products',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cdb-synapse-link2'
) AS [Products]
